Summary:
The CL and EL team meetings are summarized in files using Markdown format. 

[[
## Summary
]]


Status of mainnet merge is still pending due to issues related to 
difficulty bomb delay. The difficulty bomb will be delayed until the 
merge happens, but it's unclear when that will occur.

Devnet status: Devnet 1 has been deployed and is being used for testing.
The team is working on deploying devnet 2 with a new version of the CL.


There are no specific deadlines mentioned in this summary.
